name: Skype Mobile Switcher
author: Schurpf

sections.description:
The plugin uses a shortcode to do the following:
* On mobile: make a phone number callable from any phone
* On desktop: make a phone number callable via Skype

To use the plugin wrap your phone number in [phone] [/phone] shortcode.

Example

 `

[phone]+1 847 847 47 10[/phone]
`

A plugin with similar functionality can be found here https://wordpress.org/plugins/telephone-number-linker
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ‘skype-mobile-switcher’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Use shortcode in your editor or theme.
sections.faq: None so far. If you have any, pls ask here: https://github.com/schurpf/skype-mobile-switcher

short_description: Ultra simple plugin to add shortcode to switch Skype calls for mobile and desktop visitors.
